item.title: Mining Geoportal
item.description:
The main goal of the Mining Geoportal (GeoMiNa) is to serve as a central repository for all data related to mining activities in Venezuela. GeoMiNa is a free and open data resource intended to support public and private management in the mining sector, as well as a means to exchange data between stakeholders. GeoMiNaâ€™s users will be the staff of the Mining Ministry (MPPDME) and the Institute for Geology and Mining (INGEOMIN), who will use the data for mining research and planning in the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela.

Link: http://sigminas.desarrollominero.gob.ve
